name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade: The Action Game
name_original: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade: The Action Game
description: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade is a video game released in 1991 by Taito, for the NES based on the film with the same name. There was also an NES game with the same title released by Ubisoft in 1993 that was a completely different game in itself, but also based on the movie.
